PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1994-21611994-12-220,  ,  ,  FIN, 
PrecisAuthority (a) to enter into AGREEMENTS with CANADA ELDOR INC. (formerly Eldorado Nuclear Limited), the BANK OF MONTREAL and with R-M TRUST COMPANY whereby the Crown will assume some of Canada Eldor Ltd.'s obligations or liabilities to that bank and that trust company, and (b) to raise funds by way of the issue and sale of Treasury Bills or Notes for the purposes of those Agreements.
Attachments
precis:
Authority (a) to enter into AGREEMENTS with CANADA ELDOR INC. (formerly
Eldorado Nuclear Limited), the BANK OF MONTREAL and with R-M TRUST COMPANY
whereby the Crown will assume some of Canada Eldor Ltd.'s obligations or
liabilities to that bank and that trust company, and (b) to raise funds by
way of the issue and sale of Treasury Bills or Notes for the purposes of
those Agreements.
